name: Metaball
description: A simple plugin to draw shapes based on inner and outer tangents between two circles.
author: Misha Heesakkers

commands.name: Arc
commands.description: Draw a bezier shape based on the inner tangents between the two circles.

commands.name: Inner Tangents
commands.description: Draw a shape based on the inner tangents between the two circles.

commands.name: Outer Tangents
commands.description: Draw a shape based on the outer tangents between the two circles.
